instance.description:
S-Minefield entity that does the actual exploding. Part 2 of 3 entities involved in creating a minefield.
Part 1 - Initial entity that is constructed by the sturmpioneers. Its construction -> field_placement_info defines the mines and border for the minefield. Part 2 - The actual mines that are scattered around in the minefield. Part 3 - Border entities placed on the edge of the minefield.

list.name: extensions
list.comment: Currently this mine is almost identical to the basic mine, it just does 200 instead of 170 damage.
